title: [The Judy Garland collector's classic]

description: Documentary using archival material, newsreels, motion picture excerpts, television appearances and private home movies on one of Hollywood's legendary stars, singer/actor Judy Garland. Includes rare footage and a multi-star tribute at the premiere opening of "A Star is born". This video also includes a collector's bonus of the 1925 silent version of Wizard of Oz, directed by Larry Semon.
